aircraft.value: Dragonfly Scout - AC-9208-745 at Maintenance Hub-X

defect_observed.value: Anti-ice system insufficient heating. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Air Conditioning component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 08/09/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 10/09/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 12/09/2023 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 14/09/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 16/09/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel
